title: Ahri orb clarity?
body: Riot said they don't want to change the colour of Ahri's orb because of clarity reasons, however Chosen Master Yi (lightsaber Yi) Has completely different colours for his Wuju style states (whether the Wuju passive is on, whether the Wuju active is on, or whether they're on CD). Opinions? Feel free to comment if there are any other skins with different particles for significant things like this. I mean, it's not major but whether or not Ahri gets a smidge of SV on her next Q is comparatively minor imo. If you're counterjungling against a Yi, knowing whether or not he's getting free damage from his Wuju passive and has the active ready for use could easily determine if you're going to win a trade against him early (for example, if he's just activated his Wuju on a camp). Opinions? If anything I reckon Yi should have his Wuju colours normalized across all his skins, while the colour of Ahri's Q should be allowed to be changed.

replies.body: The only thing I could see being close to Ahris orb is Syndras so as long as Riot doesn't give Ahri a dark black/purple orb I don't think it messes with clarity much after all heaps of champs have massively changed particle colors/effects on their skins why should Ahri be any different.
